teamMembers.name: Manmohan Gupta
teamMembers.bio: Manmohan Gupta (Munna Bhaiya), an IIT-Delhi graduate, is an ace programmer, technocrat, an entrepreneurial doyen and a mathematician. He has co-founded Software giant, Nagarro and Vidyamandir Classes(VMC). Having seen both the industries from up close, he could identify a key gap between college education and industry needs and has now set out to carve the path that will turn even ordinary students into industry-ready coders.

teamMembers.name: Brij Mohan
teamMembers.bio:
Brij Mohan or Bade bhaiya, as everyone calls him, is always full of energy and keeps everyone on feet with his motivation. He has vast experience of teaching and is the founder of Vidyamandir Classes.
Bade Bhaiya, through his personal and professional growth helps in motivating and mentoring students at Coding Blocks. He is an IIT Delhi alumnus.

teamMembers.name: Anushray Gupta
teamMembers.bio:
A code lover, with an undying passion for teaching, Anushray has done his Bachelor’s in CSE from IIIT Hyderabad. He has worked with major tech companies like Facebook and Directi and played major role in many successful start-ups.
He is one of the Co-Founders of Coding Blocks. He has received amazing feedbacks for his teaching and is now serving as Programme Designer at Coding Blocks.

teamMembers.name: Priyanshu Agrawal
teamMembers.bio: Priyanshu did his bachelors in Computer Science and is a MBA graduate from MDI, Gurgaon. He has experience of working in Management & Consulting domain with Boston Analytics & Novozymes. He has also worked for Vidyamandir Classes and Nagarro in the past.

teamMembers.name: Prateek Narang
teamMembers.bio: Passionate about teaching, Prateek is a CS graduate from DTU. He has previously worked with SanDisk, HackerEarth. He has also won various hackathons including Google’s Code For India, Smart City Hackathon, qualified ACM-ICPC regionals and published papers in International Journals. His interactive CV (www.prateeknarang.com) is also popular in 120+ countries.

teamMembers.name: Arnav Gupta
teamMembers.bio: Arnav Gupta, also popular as @ChampionSwimmer, is an acclaimed Android developer and two timer GSoC-er. He has presented at large conferences like JSFOO, DroidCon, FOSSASIA and OSDConf. He has also worked with Sony, Micromax, Cyanogen and the likes. Arnav has also active contributed int the development of Android OS, Linux Kernel and will also be mentoring students in GSoC’17.

teamMembers.name: Varun Hasija
teamMembers.bio: A graduate from DTU, Varun has worked as a software developer for Practo and as an operations manager for a startup. He published two research papers in international IEEE conferences and also received acknowledgments from the likes of Michael Bernstein in papers published by Stanford graduates.

teamMembers.name: Rajesh Sachdev
teamMembers.bio: Rajesh has 20+ years of experience in IT/Corporate sector. He has previously worked with corporates like Nagarro, Cadence, American Express. He left IT industry in 2013 and moved to education with a passion to help students accomplishing their career goals. He did MS from BITS Pilani.

teamMembers.name: Varun Kohli
teamMembers.bio: Varun has been associated with the Software industry for more than 12 years & is considered an expert in the EdTech space. He has worked on multiple large scale applications and has piloted several Startups. He now dedicates his energy and experience to the design of Programs & business in Coding Blocks.

teamMembers.name: Deepak Aggarwal
teamMembers.bio: Popular for his creative thinking style, Deepak tries to offer creative solutions to problems. He is a succesful competitive programmer, having qualified for ACM-ICPC Regionals won the International Problem Solving Competition by Dyalog APL. He likes to spend his free time reading.

teamMembers.name: Rishab Kapoor
teamMembers.bio: A graduate from Guru Nanak Dev University, Rishab has worked with Harman Connected Services as a software engineer. He is proficient with web development related technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript along with Internet of Things development, OSGi framework, Spring and Hibernate.

teamMembers.name: Harshit Dwivedi
teamMembers.bio: Renowned for his “awesome” puns and stash of shwags, Harshit is a Google Certified Android Developer. He has been a GSoC participant with FOSSASIA and will also be mentoring students under GSoC 2017. He is an open source enthusiast and is also passionate about Data Science.

teamMembers.name: Garima Chhikara
teamMembers.bio: Garima pursued her masters from IIIT-Delhi and joined us to pursue her passion for teaching. She has worked with DRDO and has interest and experience in technologies like Virtual Reality, Internet of Things, Software Defined Networking, Cloud Services, Information Retrieval and Data Mining.

teamMembers.name: Aayush Arora
teamMembers.bio: Always ready for a Chess match and a cup of coffee, Aayush is a team member and an active contributor in Open Source organizations like CloudCV, FOSSASIA and Open Design. He is an avid web developer and will also be mentoring students in Google Summer of Code 2017.

teamMembers.name: Anuj Garg
teamMembers.bio: Anuj is an open-source enthusiast and a GSoC mentor and admin with JBoss Community under the RedHat Foundation. He has worked in the core teams of various products by RedHat and is an expert in Enterprise Java and web services. He will also be administrating in GSoC'19 under the umbrella of JBoss for Servers and IoT monitoring.

teamMembers.name: Sanket Singh
teamMembers.bio: Sanket is a sharp competitive programmer with a strong hold in Algorithms. He is a Google Summer Of Code student developer for Berkman Klein Centre at Harvard University. He has worked as a Deep Learning Researcher at Indian Space Research Organization(ISRO) & displayed exemplary leadership and coding skills. A multi-hackathon winner, Sanket loves to mentor students in free time and is also interested in building cool machine learning and web applications.

teamMembers.name: Raj Kumar Saini
teamMembers.bio: Raj Kumar Saini is a Computer Science graduate from DTU who has previously worked with Adobe, Amazon and DE Shaw among others. A robotics enthusiast, he is also proficient with data structures and algorithms. He has had multiple papers published in IEEE and reputed international journals, and had one of the top placements when he graduated from DTU.

teamMembers.name: Kartik Mathur
teamMembers.bio: An NSIT graduate, Kartik has worked with companies like DRDO and BEL. He has immense interest in technologies like IoT, DBMS, home automation and embedded systems. He has come to Coding Blocks to fulfill his passion for teaching. In his free time he likes to read books and play chess.

teamMembers.name: Sarthak Jain
teamMembers.bio: Sarthak is an Active OnePlus Community Expert, a recognised XDA Developer and Contributor. He was an Intern at AIR. He is a Keen Tester for Mobile ROMs of OnePlus and ZUK Z1. He has also been an Associate Mentor at LPU,Jalandhar. He was also a speaker at Google I/O Extended 2019

teamMembers.name: Jatin Katyal
teamMembers.bio: Jatin has worked with various start-ups in the field of HCI and IoT. He has won more than 10 hackathons including Microsoft campus Hack, TATA Crucible Hackathon, and Angel Hack.

teamMembers.name: Nikhil Singh
teamMembers.bio: A final year undergraduate at DTU, Nikhil is an avid pythonista who loves to create utilities and automate the boring stuff. He is passionate about teaching and has organized workshops on various Python topics. He also maintains his own YouTube channel and blog which goes by the name "Indian Pythonista".

teamMembers.name: Iti Jain
teamMembers.bio: A data science enthusiast and a competitive programmer, Iti is a passionate developer working on technologies like NodeJS, React and Angular. She has worked with Coding blocks and VLYOP Technologies, an Ed-Tech startup as a lead developer.  She likes to spare time with NGOs like Light de literacy and always looks forward to a noble cause.

teamMembers.name: Shubham Rawat
teamMembers.bio: Shubham Rawat is an Open Source geek and a fitness freak. He was a Google Code-In mentor with JBoss Community under RedHat. He has worked with Debezium Project under Redhat and also with Vlyop technology . He loves to solve puzzles and generally found dwelling with Spring Boot applications.

teamMembers.name: Prajjwal Singh
teamMembers.bio: Prajjwal is guilty of programming and other cybershenanigans. Experienced with Ruby / Rails / Sinatra, as well as JavaScript / Node / Express. Other than that, he is into UNIX, Number Theory, Machine Learning, Declarative Programming, and trolling Emacs users on IRC.

teamMembers.name: Himank Bhalla
teamMembers.bio: An enthusiastic full-stack web developer, Himank has worked at multiple Delhi based startups. He also designed the website for International Conference on Computational Techniques in Information and Communication Technologies (ICCTICT).

teamMembers.name: Abhishek Gupta
teamMembers.bio: Abhishek has worked as freelancer on many challenging projects. He is well versed with various web/backend technologies like Javascript / Node, Go, Ember.js. He is also computer networking enthusiast. Other than this, he is also interested in Physics, Mathematics and Machine learning.

teamMembers.name: Vibhu Dujari
teamMembers.bio: Vibhu is a Full Stack Developer and has worked with various startups and projects involving web technologies like JavaScript / Node / Express, Ember, Angular. He has a keen interest in CSS and is intrigued by the way different machines work.

teamMembers.name: Siddharth Jain
teamMembers.bio: A UI/UX Designer by profession, Siddharth loves converting ideas digital. He enjoys turning complex problems into easy, eye-catching and pixel perfect interfaces. Injected with creative juices and a lot of caffeine; whenever he is not making pleasing designs, he is criticizing bad ones.

teamMembers.name: Ishan Abrol
teamMembers.bio: Ishan Abrol is a MBA by education and a musician by heart. He is having 7 years of experience with various industries and has been helping them increasing their market worth. He is now using that experience in helping grow the online vertical of Coding Blocks.

teamMembers.name: Asif Khan
teamMembers.bio: Asif is Product Specialist at Coding Blocks, supporting both sales and technical activities. He is responsible for working closely with operations and R&D teams. He earned his bachelor's degree in Information Technology from MAIT.

teamMembers.name: Bhavana
teamMembers.bio: She is a computer science engineer and believes in seeking new opportunities. Having exposure in Android App development and content writing. She's currently working with us as a Business Developer to help CB achieve new heights.

teamMembers.name: KP Kushal
teamMembers.bio: An awesome motion and graphic designer. He believes that less is more and likes to keep it animated.

teamMembers.name: Rishabh Nigam
teamMembers.bio: A Journalism graduate, he's contributed articles in various media portals (national issues, feature writing and sports). With more than 3 years of experience in sales, he now handles sales of online vertical of Coding Blocks.

teamMembers.name: Vidushi Lohia
teamMembers.bio: Having 6+ years of experience in guiding students into multiple domains. She's done her M.Com. and MBA in Marketing and Media. Other than shopping, she loves to interact with new people.

teamMembers.name: Naman Kumar
teamMembers.bio: Naman is a growing software engineer and an indie maker who loves to ideate and build cool products. He has worked with various startups and large scale projects involving technologies like React, NodeJs, and Graphql. He likes to work in teams, build pixel perfect interfaces, and scalable services.
